content: आपा {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To drink up (<ab>lit.</ab> and <ab>fig.</ab>); षडाननापीतपयोधरासु <ls>R. 14. 22</ls>; आपीतसूर्यं नभः <ls>Mk. 5. 20</ls> quite concealed or obscured; दिवाकरापीतरसा महौषधीः <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--2@} To drink with the ears or eyes, hear or see intently; ता राघवं दृष्टिभिरापिबंत्यः <ls>R. 7. 12</ls>; <ls>K. 86</ls>; भगवत्कथासुधामापीयकर्णांजलिभिः <ls>Bhāg.</ls> {@--3@} To eclipse, surpass.
